parameters.query:
SELECT p.uuid, p.store_id, p.name, st.store_name AS storeName, u.name AS userName, u.email AS userEmail 
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN sides s ON p.id = s.product_id
JOIN stores st ON st.id = p.store_id
JOIN users u ON u.id = st.user_id
WHERE s.product_id IS NULL
AND DATE(p.created_at) = CURDATE()
